headline: Verizon in talks to buy EchoStar wireless spectrum, Bloomberg News reports
summary: The discussions involve the satellite communications firm's AWS-3 licenses, valuable for carrying 5G wireless signals, the report said.  If the deal goes through, Verizon would join AT&T and SpaceX as buyers of EchoStar's wireless spectrum licenses, according to Bloomberg.

raw.headline: Verizon in talks to buy EchoStar wireless spectrum, Bloomberg News reports
raw.summary: The discussions involve the satellite communications firm's AWS-3 licenses, valuable for carrying 5G wireless signals, the report said.  If the deal goes through, Verizon would join AT&T and SpaceX as buyers of EchoStar's wireless spectrum licenses, according to Bloomberg.

headline: EchoStar stock soars on potential Verizon spectrum sale talks
summary: Investing.com -- EchoStar Corporation (NASDAQ:SATS) stock jumped 7.3% in after-hours trading Monday following a Bloomberg article reporting that Verizon Communications Inc (NYSE:VZ) is in discussions to purchase some of the company’s wireless spectrum assets.
